title: Is AI art 'Art'?
summary: 'I want AI to do my laundry and dishes so that I can do art and writing. Not for AI to do art and writing so that I can do dishes and laundry.'
author: Cuddly Jellyfish

title: Color Theory: The psychology and power of color
summary: The feelings a shade can evoke.
author: Cuddly Jellyfish
